metadata.synopsis: AD options for Guard 004 - His sequence is failing to cast a spell > Read a book > Fail to cast a spell > Read book. Pretty straightforward, but will at least offer him a tiny bit of character.

0.speaker: Sparks Musgravel
0.text: Splay the fingers like so, and... damn it! Why won't it cast?
0.context: NodeContext: Trying and failing to cast a spell

1.speaker: Sparks Musgravel
1.text: If those bloody elven mages would just write their bloody tomes in bloody Common...
1.context: NodeContext: Trying and failing to cast a spell

2.speaker: Sparks Musgravel
2.text: Maybe my fingers are just too sausage-y for me to be a mage.
2.context: NodeContext: Trying and failing to cast a spell. Despondent, to himself.

3.speaker: Sparks Musgravel
3.context: NodeContext: Trying and failing to cast a spell - flubbing the latin proncunciation of 'Timere' (a frost spell). Last EH! is just a cry of frustration.
